XXgrahmdhu:2: āryagrahamātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī oṃ namo bhagavatyai āryagrahamātṛkāyai /
XXgrahmdhu:3: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān aḍakavatyāṃ mahānagaryām anekadevanāgayakṣarākṣasagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāpasmārādityasomāṅgārabudhabṛhaspatiśukraśaniścararāhuketvādibhiś cāṣṭāviṃśatinakṣatrādibhiḥ stūyamāno mahāvajrasamayālaṅkāravyūhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhite siṃhāsane viharati sma /
XXgrahmdhu:27: evaṃ pramukhair bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
XXgrahmdhu:28: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ (Gmdh 172) suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ
XXgrahmdhu:31: atha khalu vajrapāṇir bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tat parṣanmaṇḍalam avalokyāsanād utthāya svaṛddhyādhiṣṭhānena bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praṇamya purato niṣadya sagarveṇa paryaṅkam ābhujya līlayā tat parṣanmaṇḍalam avalokya vajrāñjalī svahṛdaye pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavantam etad
XXgrahmdhu:33: grahāś ca bhagavann ugrānugrarūpāś ca raudrāraudrarūpās ca krūrākrūrarūpāś ca sattvān viheṭhayanti
XXgrahmdhu:34: keṣāñcit prāṇam apaharanti keṣāñcid upadravāś ca kurvanti keṣāñcid ojohārāṃś ca kurvanti keṣāñcid dravyam apaharanti keṣāñcid dīrghāyuṣsattvānām alpāyuṣaṃ kurvanti /
XXgrahmdhu:36: tad deśayatu bhagavan dharmaparyāyaṃ yena sarvasattvānāṃ sarvopadravebhyo rakṣā bhaviṣyati
XXgrahmdhu:37: bhagavān āha - sādhu sādhu vajrapāṇe yas tvaṃ sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya kṛpācittam utpādya mahāguhyātiguhyataraṃ tathāgataṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paripṛcchasi /
XXgrahmdhu:38: tac chṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te /
XXgrahmdhu:39: grahāṇām ugrarūpāṇāṃ krūrātibhīṣaṇamukhānāṃ mahāguhyātiguhyataraṃ divyapūjām arghaṃ ca jāpañ ca dhūpañ ca -
XXgrahmdhu:42: devāś cāpy asurāś caiva kinnarāś ca mahoragāḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:43: yakṣāś ca rākṣasāś caiva manuṣāś caivāmānuṣāḥ // 2 //
XXgrahmdhu:44: śamayanti ca kruddhāś ca mahānugrāś ca tejasā /
XXgrahmdhu:45: pūjāṃ teṣāṃ pravakṣāmi mantrāṃś cāpi yathākramam* // 3 //
XXgrahmdhu:46: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamuniḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svahṛdayāt karuṇāvikrīḍitaṃ nāma raśmijvālaṃ niścārya grahāṇāṃ mūrdhni praveśayati sma /
XXgrahmdhu:47: atha tatkṣaṇād eva te sarve ādityādayo grahā utthāya bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sarvābhir divyapūjābhiḥ pūjayitvā praṇamya jānubhir nipatya kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhūtvā bhagavantam etad avocan*
XXgrahmdhu:49: anugṛhītā vayaṃ bhagavatā tathāgatenārhato samyaksaṃbuddhena tad deśayatu bhagavan tādṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ yena vayaṃ sāmagrībhūtasya dharmabhāṇakasya rakṣāṃ kuryāmaḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:50: guptiṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhanaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kuryāmaḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:51: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho grahāṇāṃ mantrapūjāñ ca bhāṣate sma /
XXgrahmdhu:61: yathānukramabhedena diśāś copadiśāś ca gandhamaṇḍalakaṃ padmamadhye dvādaśāṅgulapramāṇaṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāraṃ catustoraṇaśobhitaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ cakrasamanvitaṃ kartavyam* /
XXgrahmdhu:62: tanmadhye sitakamalopari kuṅkumagandhamaṇḍalake cintayed devaṃ bhāskaraṃ tāpasarūpadharaṃ bhujābhyāṃ sitakamaladharaṃ raktavarṇaṃ sahasrasūryakoṭisamatejomālinaṃ vigraham* /
XXgrahmdhu:66: pūrvasyāṃ diśi raktakamalopari priyaṅgugandhamaṇḍalake somo brāhmaṇa iti jñeyaṃ sitavarṇaṃ jaṭāmukuṭapuṣpāvasaktaṃ bhojanaghṛtodanaṃ śrīvāsadhūpaḥ
XXgrahmdhu:69: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śuklakamalopari candanagandhamaṇḍalake bhikṣurūpo maṅgalo raktavarṇo ratnamakuṭo vāme śakti dakṣiṇe varadahasto bhojanam asya kṣīrabhojanaṃ bhāṣabhaktaṃ vā gugguladhūpaḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:72: paścimāyām diśi raktapadmopari kṛṣṇāgarugandhamaṇḍalake brahmacārī budhaḥ syāt pītavarṇo raktaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:77: uttarasyāṃ diśi sitakamalopari devadārugandhamaṇḍalake parivrājako gurus taptakāñcanavarṇābho raktaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:81: āgneyāṃ diśi raktapadmopari candanagandhamaṇḍalake śukrapāśupatadhāri gokṣīravarṇadhavalāmbho jaṭāmukutākṣasūtrakamaṇḍaludharaḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:83: oṃ namaḥ śukrādhipataye asurottamāya śuddhavigrahe svāhā /
XXgrahmdhu:84: nairṛtyāṃ diśi sitapaṅkajopari nīlacandanagandhamaṇḍalake śaniścaro kṛṣṇavarṇaphaṇabhṛtkṣapaṇako jñeyaḥ bījajaṭāmukuṭaśmaśruḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:89: vāyavyāṃ diśi raktāmbhojopari tagarādigandhamaṇḍalake kāpāliko rāhu rājāvartanibho 'rdhadeho ravirathabhayānakalocanayugo daṃṣṭrākarālo bhṛkuṭīkṛtalalāṭapañcavarṇaḥ meghamadhyagato bhujābhyāṃ
XXgrahmdhu:91: asya deyaṃ bhāṣāmiṣabhojanaṃ tilakṛṣaro vā vilvapatradhūpaḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:94: aiśānyāṃ diśi raktasaroruhopari spṛkkāgandhamaṇḍalake cāṇḍālaketur bhavet*
XXgrahmdhu:96: asya deyaṃ bhojanaṃ dhṛtapūrakaṃ sajjaraso dhūpaḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:98: maṇḍalasya pūrvadvāre buddho bhagavān dakṣiṇadvāre vajrapāṇiḥ paścimadvāre lokanāthaḥ uttaradvāre mañjuśrīkumāraḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:99: pūrvottarakoṇe sarve grahāḥ pūrvadakṣiṇakoṇe sarve rāśinakṣatrāḥ dakṣiṇapaścimakoṇe sarvopadravāḥ paścimottarakoṇe bhaṭṭārikā mahāvidyā /
XXgrahmdhu:100: śvetā nīlāruṇatrimukhā hastadvayena vyākhyānamudrā dakṣiṇe ratnachatrā vāme pāśaśaktidharā ratnamukuṭīvajraparyaṅkopaviṣṭā candāsanasamāsīnā ṣoḍaśavarṣākārā sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitā /
XXgrahmdhu:101: bāhyapūrvadvāre dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dadhibhaktaṃ dakṣiṇe virūḍhakasya dadhimāṣabhaktaṃ paścime virūpākṣasya kṣīrabhatam uttare kuberasya dadhimāṣabhaktaṃ sindūramastakam* /
XXgrahmdhu:104: dhṛtamadhubhyāṃ śaṃkhaṃ pūrayitvā pañcaratnaṃ prakṣipyārgho deyaḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:108: oṃ namaḥ sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvāśāparipūrakebhyaḥ sarvathā bhaktine svāhā /
XXgrahmdhu:109: ratnatrayasya mantraṃ evaṃ pratyekaṃ japet saptasaptāṣṭaśataṃ mantram ekaikaśaḥ /
XXgrahmdhu:110: evaṃ pūjitāḥ sarve grahā vividharūpiṇo dadati vipulān bhogān saubhāgyān* janayanty api /
XXgrahmdhu:111: imāni vajrapāṇe navagrahāṇāṃ hṛdayāni paṭhitasiddhāni tathānukramabhedena gandhamaṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā dvādaśāṅgulimadhye pūjayitavyāni tāmramṛṇmayarūpyādibhojanena arghaṃ datvāṣṭottaraśatavārān mantraṃ japet*
XXgrahmdhu:113: paścāt punar vajrapāṇe gṛhamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni saptavārānuccārayitavyāni /
XXgrahmdhu:115: dāridryaṃ duḥkhaṃ mocayiṣyanti gatāyuṣaṃ dīrghāyuṣaṃ kariṣyanti /
XXgrahmdhu:116: yaś ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikān ye vā sattvajātīyā yeṣāṃ karṇapuṭe śabdaṃ nipatiṣyanti na teṣām akālamṛtyunā kālaṃ kariṣyanti /
XXgrahmdhu:117: yaś ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe grahān maṇḍalamadhye pūjayitvā dine dine saptavārānuccārayiṣyanti
XXgrahmdhu:118: tatra tasya dharmabhāṇakasya sarve grahāḥ sarveṇa sarvāśāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti /
XXgrahmdhu:120: atha khalu bhagavāñ chākyamuni tathāgataḥ punar api gṛhamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni bhāṣate sma /
XXgrahmdhu:134: oṃ buddhe 2 śuddhe 2 vajre 2 padme 2 sara 2 prasare 2 smara 2 krīḍa 2
XXgrahmdhu:135: krīḍaya 2 mara 2 māraya 2 mardaya 2 stambha 2 stambhaya 2 ghaṭa 2 ghāṭaya
XXgrahmdhu:136: 2 mama sarvasattvānāñ ca vighnān* chinda chinda bhinda 2 sarvavighnān nāśanaṃ kuru 2 mama saparivārasya sarvasattvānāñ ca kāryaṃ kṣepaya 2 mama sarvasattvānāñ ca sarvanakṣatragrahapīḍān nivāraya 2 bhagavati śriyaṃ kuru
XXgrahmdhu:137: mahāmāyā prasādhaya sarvaduṣṭān nāśaya sarvapāpāni mama saparivārasya sarvasattvānāñ ca rakṣa 2 vajre 2 caṇḍe 2 caṇḍini 2 nuru 2 musu 2 mumu 2
XXgrahmdhu:138: muñca 2 havā have ugre ugratare pūraya bhagavati manorathaṃ mama sarvaparivārasya sarvasattvānāñ ca sarvatathāgatādiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhite svāhā /
XXgrahmdhu:162: imāni vajrapāṇe grahamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni sarvasiddhikarāṇi ca /
XXgrahmdhu:163: yac ca khalu punar vajrapāṇe imāni grahamātṛkānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni kārtikamāsaśuklapakṣasya saptamīm ārabhyopoṣadhiko bhūtvā yāvac caturdaśīgrahanakṣatrān madhye pūjayitvā dine dine saptavārānuccārayitavyāni /
XXgrahmdhu:169: atha te sarve grahāḥ sādhu bhagavann iti kṛtvā praṇamyāntarhitābhūvann iti
XXgrahmdhu:170: / idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatīparṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
